message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to start with a price of $950,000, which is a very competitive offer considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $950,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for this product, given its value to me. I'm confident this price is fair considering the potential benefits you've mentioned. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand that $850,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value the product holds for you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price that reflects the product's value to you, while also taking into account the initial price I was looking for.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice.  $900,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $875,000, which is a significant increase from my previous offer.  I believe this is a fair price that acknowledges the product's value to me, while allowing us to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see that you're willing to make a significant investment in this product. I'm willing to meet you at $885,000, which is a compromise that I believe reflects the value of the product to you, while also allowing me to get a fair price. Let's see if we can seal the deal!
